title: Xin Xhao W Feels Clunky
body:
The new Xin is thematic, fun and smooth to play.

Until you press W. Then he stands still, removing your ability to kite, stops all auto attacks for what feels like a significant period of time, then slashes and thrusts, almost invisible in a 1v1, and most certainly invisible in a full blown teamfight. Like Rengar's Q, this breaks the chain of gameplay, abruptly stopping the smooth and flowing animations that is the new Xhao.

Was the mastermind behind for Rengar's abomination of a Q also responsible for this?

replies.body: Xin's w does a significant amount of damage and resets his passive

Rengar's Q was designed so there was more outplay and skill involved in using it because his old q was just an auto attack enhancer and you would literally activate it just before jumping in with your ultimate and you got free 300+ dmg on your leap attack. It was much easier and faster to one shot a target, nowadays you need to either be extremely fed or you have to land your full combo and another ferocity q to kill an adc from my experience.
